title: Trump Defamation Suit by Former ‘Apprentice’ Contestant Is Dropped
sub_head: Summer Zervos sued the former president for saying claims of unwanted touching and kissing were a hoax
body:
Former “Apprentice” contestant Summer Zervos ended her defamation lawsuit against Donald Trump on Friday, her lawyers said.
“After five years, Ms. Zervos no longer wishes to litigate against the defendant and has secured the right to speak freely about her experience. Ms. Zervos stands by the allegations in her complaint and has accepted no compensation,” Beth Wilkinson and Moira Penza said.
